m_descr:
This module will automatically turn off selected devices (switch, dimmer, motor control) after no movement or activity has been detected for a defined time.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-AutoOffInactive for detailed documentation.
sensors_helper: Multiple binary sensors (ideally movement sensors) that measure presence
switch_helper: Multiple switches that should be turned off after given inactivity
timeout_helper: Timeout period in minutes. Will turn off device n-minutes after the last activity
